title: Assessing the quality and grain yield of winter wheat in the organic farming management under wheat-legume intercropping practice
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Trong Nghia Hoang, Petr Konvalina, Marek Kopecký, Mohammad Ghorbani, Thi Giang Nguyen, Jaroslav Bernas, Yves Theoneste Murindangabo, Ivana Capouchová, Sangin Shim, Petra Hlásná Čepková
